name: Phoenix Suns
info: Footprint Center is a multi-purpose arena in Phoenix, Arizona. Built in the regional population epicenter of Arizona, being home of the Phoenix Suns, With also having the best record in the National Basketball Association!

name: Arizona Cardinals
info: State Farm Stadium is a multi-purpose stadium in Glendale, Arizona, United States, west of Phoenix. It is the home of the Arizona Cardinals of the National Football League and the annual Fiesta Bowl. State Farm Stadium replaced Sun Devil Stadium in Tempe as the home of the Cardinals.

name: Arizona Diamondbacks
info: Chase Field, formerly Bank One Ballpark, is a retractable roof stadium in Downtown Phoenix, Arizona. It is the home of Major League Baseball's Arizona Diamondbacks.

name: Arizona Coyotes
info: Gila River Arena is a multi-purpose entertainment arena located Glendale, Arizona. The arena anchors the 223-acre, $1 billion development Westgate Entertainment District. The Gila River Arena is also the home of the Arizona Coyotes of the National Hockey League.
